issues.description: The Solution repository’s Farm class uses a Set<Animal> (HashSet) for the `animals` attribute and its getter/setter, but the problem statement and UML diagram explicitly require a List<Animal> implemented with an ArrayList. This discrepancy may confuse students about which collection type to use and its expected behaviors.
issues.suggested_fix: In the solution repository, change the `animals` attribute type from Set<Animal> to List<Animal>, initialize it with an ArrayList in the no-argument constructor, and update the getter, setter, and iteration in singFarmSong() to use List<Animal> so it matches the problem specification.
